params.calls: The array of calls to execute

guards(address).notice: Returns the guard for a specific target

isTrustedTarget(address).notice: Returns whether a target is trusted

removeGuard(address).notice: Removes the guard for a specific target

setGuard(address,address).notice: Sets the guard for a specific target

setTrustedTarget(address,bool).notice: Sets a target as trusted or untrusted
